|flags = Smart switch, 4x SFP/RJ45 Combo ports, LACP, SNMP, MSTP, RSTP, heatsink, metal case |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |accessible_UART = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 06/2013 |price = |reldate = |newegg = 9SIAHJ3D031826 |upc = |ean = |asin = B00AI9H628 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8382M Multi-Layer Managed :Switch Controller w/ Embedded [[MIPS 4KEc]] @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB RAM (DDR3) *LAN: 24x Gigabit Ethernet (RJ45) ports, :4x GbE SFP/RJ45 Shared slots, :56Gbps switching capacity *Rack mountable (1U, 19") ==Links of Interest== *[https://eu.dlink.com/be/nl/-/media/business_products/dgs/dgs-1210/datasheet/dgs_1210_series_f1_datasheet_en_eu.pdf Datasheet] *[https://svanheule.net/switches/dgs-1210_series ''D-Link DGS-1210'' series on '''svanheule''' wiki] 
Revision	Port variants			Hardware platform

A1		10P, 16, 24, 48			Marvell
B1		10P, 20, 28(P), 52		Marvell
C1		10(P), 20, 28(P), 52(P/MP)	Broadcom
F1		10(P/MP), 26, 28(P/MP), 52(MP)	Realtek RTL838x
G1		8P, 10, 16, 24(P), 48		Realtek RTL838x
R1		10(P/MP),26,28(P/MP),52(MP/MPP)	32MB/256MB
